scripts.build-release-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.build-release-bundle-ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/posted/main.jsbundle --dev=false --platform ios --assets-dest ios
